about.server:
Bare Metal Server - Redundant Servers Structure with high availability and loadbalancing. 
            Servers:
            2x A+ Server 1014S-WTRT
            2x 1x AMD Rome 7452, 32C, 2.35GHz
            8x 64GB DDR4-3200 RAM (512GB)
            1x 480GB SATA SSD
            1x 10GBase-T (RJ45) dual-port NIC
    
            Storage (Raid 6):
            12x 7TB Intel SSD DC S4500 Series
